files.patch:
@@ -1822,5 +1822,0 @@
-  product(bool, ExtendedDTraceProbes,    false,                             \
-          "(Deprecated) Enable performance-impacting dtrace probes. "       \
-          "Use the combination of -XX:+DTraceMethodProbes, "                \
-          "-XX:+DTraceAllocProbes and -XX:+DTraceMonitorProbes instead.")   \
-                                                                            \
